mapper.select: SELECT o.* FROM orders o LEFT JOIN reviews r ON o.id = r.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND o.status = 2 AND r.id IS NULL ORDER BY o.complete_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = 1, payment_status = 1, payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, payment_time = #{paymentTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY create_time DESC
